about_the_game:
Just Move On! is a challenging and fast-paced platformer currently in Early Access. In this game, you take control of Jack/Jill, determined characters with a knack for leaping across risky landscapes. Your objective is simple: overcome all obstacles and reach the goal on the other side!

Key Features:

Classic Platforming: Experience the thrill of classic platforming gameplay. Run, jump, and navigate your way through a variety of levels filled with obstacles and challenges.

Progressive Difficulty: Just Move On! eases you into the platforming experience with manageable introductory levels. However, don't be fooled! The challenge quickly ramps up, introducing new obstacles and hazards that will put your reflexes and precision to the test. As you progress, the levels become increasingly intricate and demanding, offering a truly rewarding experience for skilled platforming enthusiasts.

Stay Tuned!

The development team is actively working on expanding the world of Just Move On! You can expect new content, features, and improvements based on player feedback throughout the Early Access period.

We welcome you to join the Just Move On! community and be a part of the game's development journey!

CREDITS:

Characters: Elina Gorter
Music: Lex Ellis

name: Just Move On!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i3-10100 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 (or equivalent dedicated graphics card with 2 GB of GDDR5 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11400 or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 570 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Just Move On! Is a platformer game currently in EARLY ACCESS. Master the challenge! Jump, dodge, and dash your way to the finish.
